duties_responsibilities.duty: Cleaning and maintenance of athletic facilities including sweeping, mopping, vacuuming, and dusting.
Maintaining and making recommendations regarding outdoor equipment and supplies.
Venue preparation for events and cleaning of all athletic facilities.
Traveling to different facilities daily and off campus to procure supplies daily. Mandatory overtime during peak event time.
Using communication device to maintain communication expectations of the position.
Ability to work outdoors in all weather conditions and lift and move 50 pounds if necessary.
